page.title: 12ADULT RECREATION
page.content: The{Golf Course}has a membership fee of approx.{Â£70 per annum.}When visitors come for a{round of golf}they have to pay from{Â£6 to Â£12 depending on the{condition of the course.}They play{darts and pool}at the{local {tavern.}There is a{Pigeon Club}with an {annual membership fee of Â£10.}You can {hire a basket for a Â£1.}You have to pay{20p. for a clock to be set.}A fee of {15p. is payable for every pigeon {entered in a race.}The{Bowling Club}in Ladybank is{63 years old.}The membership fee is{Â£11 for gents, Â£10 {ladies, Â£5 juniors, Â£4 senior {citizens.}Visitors have to put a {donation in a box for a game.}The club has a{membership of 250. In the summer lots of keen gardeners can be seen in their gardens.
